meanings.definition: A small aquatic mammal with webbed feet and a long snout.
meanings.sent1: The desmans swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a family of desmans playing by the river.
meanings.sent3: The desmans held a swimming competition for the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The desmans' sleek bodies glided through the water like tiny submarines.
meanings.sent5: Children love learning about desmans because they are such unique creatures.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'desman', referring to more than one of these animals.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the desmans swimming together in the lake.
meanings.sent2: The desmans in the exhibit were very active and playful.
meanings.sent3: The desmans decided to have a picnic by the riverbank.
meanings.sent4: The desmans' community spirit was evident in their synchronized swimming.
meanings.sent5: The researchers studied the behavior of desmans in their natural habitat.
